nodes.text: Scouts were individuals who surveyed, patrolled, or explored areas of land. The Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps included scout troopers. The Ewok Wicket W. Warrick was a scout.[source?] The Gungan Grand Army used Gungan scouts who rode swift beasts called kaadu into combat. Several Felucians served as scouts for the Grand Army of the Republic during the Second Battle of Felucia. Also in the Grand Army of the Republic a regiment that had clone trooper scouts. The two best scouts in the regiment were considered to be a commander and a lieutenant. Wollivan was an interstellar scout who blazed hyperspace trails between the far-flung stars of the galaxy.
